mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, create_user, create_date, hit_cnt FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
SELECT board_idx, title, contents, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, hit_cnt FROM t_board WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, contents, create_user, create_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{createUser}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_date = now() WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_board SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE board_idx = ${boardIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
